 38
 39template <typename ComplexType>
 40inline rt_complex_type
 41complex_format()
 42{
 43  if (Type_equal<ComplexType, Cmplx_inter_fmt>::value)
 44    return cmplx_inter_fmt;
 45  else
 46    return cmplx_split_fmt;
 47}
 48
 49
 50template <dimension_type D,
 51	  typename       Order,
 52	  typename       PackType,
 53	  typename	 ComplexType>
 54inline rt_complex_type
 55complex_format(Layout<D, Order, PackType, ComplexType>)
 56{
 57  return complex_format<ComplexType>();
 58}
 59
 60
 61
 62template <dimension_type D>
 63inline rt_complex_type
 64complex_format(Rt_layout<D> const& rtl)
 65{
 66  return rtl.complex;
 67}
 68
 69
 70
 71template <dimension_type D>
 72inline rt_complex_type
 73complex_format(Applied_layout<Rt_layout<D> > const& appl)
 74{
 75  return appl.cformat_;
 76}
 77
 78
 79
 80template <typename PackType>
 81inline rt_pack_type
 82pack_format()
 83{
 84  if      (Type_equal<PackType, Stride_unknown>::value)
 85    return stride_unknown;
 86  else if (Type_equal<PackType, Stride_unit>::value)
 87    return stride_unit;
 88  else if (Type_equal<PackType, Stride_unit_dense>::value)
 89    return stride_unit_dense;
 90  else /* if (Type_equal<PackType, Stride_unit_align>::value) */
 91    return stride_unit_align;
 92}
 93
 94template <dimension_type D,
 95	  typename       Order,
 96	  typename       PackType,
 97	  typename	 ComplexType>
 98inline rt_pack_type
 99pack_format(Layout<D, Order, PackType, ComplexType>)
100{
101  return pack_format<PackType>();
102}
103
104
105
106template <dimension_type D>
107inline rt_pack_type
108pack_format(Rt_layout<D> const& rtl)
109{
110  return rtl.pack;
111}
112
113
114
115template <dimension_type D,
116	  typename       Order,
117	  typename       PackType,
118	  typename	 ComplexType>
119inline unsigned
120layout_alignment(Layout<D, Order, PackType, ComplexType>)
121{
122  return Is_stride_unit_align<PackType>::align;
123}
124
125
126
127template <dimension_type D>
128inline unsigned
129layout_alignment(Rt_layout<D> const& rtl)
130{
131  return rtl.align;
132}
133
134
135template <dimension_type D,
136	  typename       OrderType,
137	  typename       PackType,
138	  typename	 ComplexType>
139inline dimension_type
140layout_nth_dim(
141  Layout<D, OrderType, PackType, ComplexType> const&,
142  dimension_type const d)
143{
144  if      (d == 0) return OrderType::impl_dim0;
145  else if (d == 1) return OrderType::impl_dim1;
146  else /*if (d == 2)*/ return OrderType::impl_dim2;
147}
148
149
150
151template <dimension_type D>
152inline dimension_type
153layout_nth_dim(Rt_layout<D> const& rtl, dimension_type const d)
154{
155  if      (d == 0) return rtl.order.impl_dim0;
156  else if (d == 1) return rtl.order.impl_dim1;
157  else /*if (d == 2)*/ return rtl.order.impl_dim2;
158}
159
160
161
162template <dimension_type D,
163	  typename       Block>
164inline Rt_layout<D>
165block_layout(Block const&)
166{
167  typedef typename Block_layout<Block>::access_type  access_type;
168  typedef typename Block_layout<Block>::order_type   order_type;
169  typedef typename Block_layout<Block>::pack_type    pack_type;
170  typedef typename Block_layout<Block>::complex_type complex_type;
171
172  return Rt_layout<D>(
173    pack_format<pack_type>(),
174    Rt_tuple(order_type()),
175    complex_format<complex_type>(),
176    Is_stride_unit_align<pack_type>::align);
177}
178
179
180
181template <typename Block1T,
182	  typename Block2T,
183	  bool Is_direct = 
184	     Type_equal<typename Block_layout<Block1T>::access_type,
185			Direct_access_tag>::value &&
186	     Type_equal<typename Block_layout<Block2T>::access_type,
187			Direct_access_tag>::value,
188	  bool Is_split1 = Is_split_block<Block1T>::value,
189	  bool Is_split2 = Is_split_block<Block2T>::value>
190struct Is_alias_helper
191{
192  static bool value(Block1T const&, Block2T const&) { return false; }
193};
194
195template <typename Block1T,
196	  typename Block2T>
197struct Is_alias_helper<Block1T, Block2T, true, false, false>
198{
199  static bool value(Block1T const& blk1, Block2T const& blk2)
200  { return blk1.impl_data() == blk2.impl_data(); }
201};
202
203template <typename Block1T,
204	  typename Block2T>
205struct Is_alias_helper<Block1T, Block2T, true, true, true>
206{
207  static bool value(Block1T const& blk1, Block2T const& blk2)
208  {
209    return blk1.impl_data().first == blk2.impl_data().first &&
210           blk1.impl_data().second == blk2.impl_data().second;
211  }
212};
213
214
215
216/// Check if two blocks may potentially alias each other when using
217/// Ext_data.
218
219template <typename Block1T,
220	  typename Block2T>
221inline bool
222is_alias(
223  Block1T const& blk1,
224  Block2T const& blk2)
225{
226  return Is_alias_helper<Block1T, Block2T>::value(blk1, blk2);
227}
228
229
230
231namespace data_access
232{
233
234/// Determine if direct access is OK at runtime for a given block.
235
236template <typename BlockT,
237	  typename LayoutT>
238bool
239is_direct_ok(
240  BlockT const&  block,
241  LayoutT const& layout)
242{
243  typedef typename BlockT::value_type                value_type;
244  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::layout_type block_layout_type;
245
246  dimension_type const dim = LayoutT::dim;
247
248  block_layout_type block_layout;
249
250  dimension_type const dim0 = layout_nth_dim(block_layout, 0);
251  dimension_type const dim1 = layout_nth_dim(block_layout, 1);
252  dimension_type const dim2 = layout_nth_dim(block_layout, 2);
253
254  if (Is_complex<value_type>::value &&
255      complex_format(block_layout) != complex_format(layout))
256    return false;
257
258  for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
259    if (layout_nth_dim(block_layout, d) != layout_nth_dim(layout, d))
260      return false;
261
262  if (pack_format(layout) == stride_unit)
263  {
264    if (dim == 1)
265      return block.impl_stride(1, 0) == 1;
266    else if (dim == 2)
267      return block.impl_stride(2, dim1) == 1;
268    else /* if (dim == 3) */
269      return block.impl_stride(3, dim2) == 1;
270  }
271  else if (pack_format(layout) == stride_unit_dense)
272  {
273    if (dim == 1)
274      return block.impl_stride(1, 0) == 1;
275    else if (dim == 2)
276      return    block.impl_stride(2, dim1) == 1
277	     && (   block.impl_stride(2, dim0) ==
278		       static_cast<stride_type>(block.size(2, dim1))
279		 || block.size(2, dim0) == 1);
280    else /* if (dim == 3) */
281    {
282
283      bool ok2 = (block.impl_stride(3, dim2) == 1);
284      bool ok1 = (block.impl_stride(3, dim1) ==
285		  static_cast<stride_type>(block.size(3, dim2)))
286	|| (block.size(3, dim1) == 1 && block.size(3, dim0) == 1);
287      bool ok0 = (block.impl_stride(3, dim0) ==
288		  static_cast<stride_type>(block.size(3, dim1) *
289					   block.size(3, dim2)))
290	|| block.size(3, dim0) == 1;
291
292      return ok0 && ok1 && ok2;
293    }
294  }
295  else if (pack_format(layout) == stride_unit_align)
296  {
297    // unsigned align = Is_stride_unit_align<typename LP::pack_type>::align;
298    unsigned align = layout_alignment(layout);
299
300    if (!data_access::is_aligned_to(block.impl_data(), align))
301      return false;
302
303    if (dim == 1)
304      return block.impl_stride(1, 0) == 1;
305    else if (dim == 2)
306      return block.impl_stride(2, dim1) == 1 &&
307	((block.impl_stride(2, dim0) * sizeof(value_type)) % align == 0);
308    else /* if (LP::dim == 3) */
309      return 
310	block.impl_stride(3, dim2) == 1 &&
311	(block.impl_stride(3, dim1) * sizeof(value_type)) % align == 0 &&
312	(block.impl_stride(3, dim0) * sizeof(value_type)) % align == 0;
313  }
314  else /* if (Type_equal<typename LP::pack_type, Stride_unknown>::value) */
315  {
316    assert(pack_format(layout) == stride_unknown);
317    return true;
318  }
319}
320
321
322
323/// Run-time low-level data access class.
324
325/// Requires
326///   AT to be an access-type tag,
327///   BLOCK to be a VSIPL++ block type,
328///   DIM to be the dimension of the desired run-time layout.
329
330template <typename       AT,
331	  typename       Block,
332	  dimension_type Dim>
333class Rt_low_level_data_access;
334
335
336
337/// Specialization for low-level direct data access.
338
339/// Depending on the requested run-time layout, data will either be
340/// accessed directly, or will be copied into a temporary buffer.
341///
342/// Requires:
343///   BLOCK to be a block that supports direct access via member
344///     functions impl_data() and impl_stride().  Access to these
345///     members can be protected by making Low_level_data_access a friend
346///     class to the block.
347///   DIM to be the dimension of the desired run-time layout.
348
349template <typename       Block,
350	  dimension_type Dim>
351class Rt_low_level_data_access<Direct_access_tag, Block, Dim>
352{
353  // Compile time typedefs.
354public:
355  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
356
357  typedef typename Block::value_type value_type;
358  typedef Rt_allocated_storage<value_type> storage_type;
359  typedef Rt_pointer<value_type> raw_ptr_type;
360
361  // Compile- and run-time properties.
362public:
363  static int   const CT_Cost          = 2;
364  static bool  const CT_Mem_not_req   = false;
365  static bool  const CT_Xfer_not_req  = false;
366
367  static int    cost         (Block const& block, Rt_layout<Dim> const& rtl)
368    { return is_direct_ok(block, rtl) ? 0 : 2; }
369
370  static size_t mem_required (Block const& block, Rt_layout<Dim> const& )
371    { return sizeof(typename Block::value_type) * block.size(); }
372  static size_t xfer_required(Block const& , Rt_layout<Dim> const& )
373    { return !CT_Xfer_not_req; }
374
375  // Constructor and destructor.
376public:
377  Rt_low_level_data_access(
378    Block&                blk,
379    Rt_layout<Dim> const& rtl,
380    bool                  no_preserve,
381    raw_ptr_type          buffer = NULL,
382    length_type           buffer_size = 0)
383  : use_direct_(!no_preserve && is_direct_ok(blk, rtl)),
384    app_layout_(use_direct_ ?
385		Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> >(empty_layout) :
386		Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> >(
387		  rtl, extent<dim>(blk), sizeof(value_type))),
388    storage_(use_direct_ ? 0 : app_layout_.total_size(), rtl.complex, buffer)
389  {
390    assert(use_direct_ ||
391	   buffer_size == 0 || app_layout_.total_size() <= buffer_size);
392  }
393
394  ~Rt_low_level_data_access()
395    { if (storage_.is_alloc()) storage_.deallocate(app_layout_.total_size()); }
396
397  void begin(Block* blk, bool sync)
398  {
399    if (!use_direct_ && sync)
400      Rt_block_copy_to_ptr<Dim, Block>::copy(blk, app_layout_,
401					     storage_.data());
402  }
403
404  void end(Block* blk, bool sync)
405  {
406    if (!use_direct_ && sync)
407      Rt_block_copy_from_ptr<Dim, Block>::copy(blk, app_layout_,
408					       storage_.data());
409  }
410
411  int cost() const { return use_direct_ ? 0 : 2; }
412
413  // Direct data acessors.
414public:
415  raw_ptr_type data(Block* blk) const
416    { return use_direct_ ? raw_ptr_type(blk->impl_data()) : storage_.data(); }
417
418  stride_type stride(Block* blk, dimension_type d) const
419    { return use_direct_ ? blk->impl_stride(dim, d) : app_layout_.stride(d);  }
420
421  length_type size(Block* blk, dimension_type d) const
422    { return use_direct_ ? blk->size(dim, d) : blk->size(Block::dim, d); }
423
424  // Member data.
425private:
426  bool                            use_direct_;
427  Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > app_layout_;
428  storage_type                    storage_;
429};
430
431
432
433/// Specialization for low-level copied data access.
434
435/// Requires:
436///   BLOCK to be a block.
437///   DIM to be the dimension of the desired run-time layout.
438
439template <typename       Block,
440	  dimension_type Dim>
441class Rt_low_level_data_access<Copy_access_tag, Block, Dim>
442{
443  // Compile time typedefs.
444public:
445  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
446
447  typedef typename Block::value_type value_type;
448  typedef Rt_allocated_storage<value_type> storage_type;
449  typedef Rt_pointer<value_type> raw_ptr_type;
450
451  // Compile- and run-time properties.
452public:
453  static int   const CT_Cost          = 2;
454  static bool  const CT_Mem_not_req   = false;
455  static bool  const CT_Xfer_not_req  = false;
456
457  static int    cost         (Block const& block, Rt_layout<Dim> const& rtl)
458    { return is_direct_ok(block, rtl) ? 0 : 2; }
459
460  static size_t mem_required (Block const& block, Rt_layout<Dim> const& )
461    { return sizeof(typename Block::value_type) * block.size(); }
462  static size_t xfer_required(Block const& , Rt_layout<Dim> const& )
463    { return !CT_Xfer_not_req; }
464
465  // Constructor and destructor.
466public:
467  Rt_low_level_data_access(
468    Block&                blk,
469    Rt_layout<Dim> const& rtl,
470    bool                  /*no_preserve*/,
471    raw_ptr_type          buffer = NULL,
472    length_type           buffer_size = 0)
473  : app_layout_(Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> >(
474		  rtl, extent<dim>(blk), sizeof(value_type))),
475    storage_(app_layout_.total_size(), rtl.complex, buffer)
476  {
477    assert(buffer_size == 0 || app_layout_.total_size() <= buffer_size);
478  }
479
480  ~Rt_low_level_data_access()
481    { if (storage_.is_alloc()) storage_.deallocate(app_layout_.total_size()); }
482
483  void begin(Block* blk, bool sync)
484  {
485    if (sync)
486    {
487      expr::evaluate(*blk);
488      Rt_block_copy_to_ptr<Dim, Block>::copy(blk, app_layout_,
489					     storage_.data());
490    }
491  }
492
493  void end(Block* blk, bool sync)
494  {
495    if (sync)
496      Rt_block_copy_from_ptr<Dim, Block>::copy(blk, app_layout_,
497					       storage_.data());
498  }
499
500  int cost() const { return 2; }
501
502  // Direct data acessors.
503public:
504  raw_ptr_type data(Block*) const
505    { return storage_.data(); }
506
507  stride_type stride(Block*, dimension_type d) const
508    { return app_layout_.stride(d);  }
509
510  length_type size(Block* blk, dimension_type d) const
511    { return blk->size(Block::dim, d); }
512
513  // Member data.
514private:
515  Applied_layout<Rt_layout<Dim> > app_layout_;
516  storage_type                    storage_;
517};
518
519} // namespace vsip::impl::data_access
520
521
522
523/// Run-time high-level data access class.  Provides data access to data
524/// stored in blocks, using an appropriate low-level data interface.
525///
526/// Template parameters:
527///   :Block: is a block type.  It should not be const.
528///   :Dim: is the dimension of the run-time layout policy for data access.
529///   :RP: is a reference counting policy.
530///
531/// Notes:
532///  - When using Rt_ext_data to access a const block:
533///     - :Block: should be the non-const base block type.
534///     - Rt_ext_data should be constructed with a const block reference.
535template <typename       Block,
536	  dimension_type Dim = Block_layout<Block>::dim,
537	  typename       RP  = No_count_policy>
538class Rt_ext_data : Assert_proper_block<Block>
539{
540  // Compile time typedefs.
541public:
542  typedef typename Non_const_of<Block>::type non_const_block_type;
543
544  typedef typename Block_layout<Block>::access_type              AT;
545  typedef data_access::Rt_low_level_data_access<AT, Block, Dim>  ext_type;
546  typedef typename Block::value_type                             value_type;
547  typedef Rt_pointer<value_type>                                 raw_ptr_type;
548
549
550  // Compile- and run-time properties.
551public:
552  static int   const CT_Cost          = ext_type::CT_Cost;
553  static bool  const CT_Mem_not_req   = ext_type::CT_Mem_not_req;
554  static bool  const CT_Xfer_not_req  = ext_type::CT_Xfer_not_req;
555
556
557  // Constructor and destructor.
558public:
559  Rt_ext_data(non_const_block_type& block,
560	      Rt_layout<Dim> const& rtl,
561	      sync_action_type      sync   = SYNC_INOUT,
562	      raw_ptr_type          buffer = 0, /*storage_type::null()*/
563	      length_type           buffer_size = 0)
564    : blk_    (&block),
565      ext_    (block, rtl, sync & SYNC_NOPRESERVE_impl, buffer, buffer_size),
566      sync_   (sync)
567    { ext_.begin(blk_.get(), sync_ & SYNC_IN); }
568
569  Rt_ext_data(Block const&          block,
570	      Rt_layout<Dim> const& rtl,
571	      sync_action_type      sync,
572	      raw_ptr_type          buffer = 0, /*storage_type::null()*/
573	      length_type           buffer_size = 0)
574    : blk_ (&const_cast<Block&>(block)),
575      ext_ (const_cast<Block&>(block), rtl,
576	    sync & SYNC_NOPRESERVE_impl, buffer, buffer_size),
577      sync_(sync)
578  {
579    assert(sync != SYNC_OUT && sync != SYNC_INOUT);
580    ext_.begin(blk_.get(), sync_ & SYNC_IN);
581  }
582
583  ~Rt_ext_data()
584    { ext_.end(blk_.get(), sync_ & SYNC_OUT); }
585
586  // Direct data acessors.
587public:
588  raw_ptr_type data() const
589    { return ext_.data(blk_.get()); }
590
591  stride_type  stride(dimension_type d) const
592    { return ext_.stride(blk_.get(), d); }
593
594  length_type  size(dimension_type d) const
595    { return ext_.size(blk_.get(), d); }
596
597  int           cost  () const
598    { return ext_.cost(); }
599
600  // Member data.
601private:
602  typename View_block_storage<Block>::template With_rp<RP>::type
603		   blk_;
604  ext_type         ext_;
605  sync_action_type sync_;
606};
607
608} // namespace vsip::impl
609} // namespace vsip
